desc: 150% boost to Spark damage, raises max Atk value from 99999 to 150000 & hugely boosts elemental damage

dictionary.lore: According to a legend from another world, there was once an incredibly strong and chivalrous man who faced an arduous trial set by a wise sage only to barely escape with his life. Swearing revenge upon the sage, the man who had survived dedicated the rest of his life to honing his skills as a warrior. Using every single opportunity at his disposal to overcome the limits of his swordsmanship and eventually grow to challenge even the gods in expertise, he came to regret but one thing about the path he had chosen: the fact that he himself had turned into the sage he so despised.

name: Sage's Mercy
